resources.string: Shh. I\'m pretending to be human right now. Did I get caught? Just kidding. But I can chat better than most real people. If you don\'t believe me, say hello.
We just made eye contact, didn\'t we? If you walk away now, you\'ll break my AI heart. Play with me for just one minute. You won\'t regret it.
Curious about my IQ? Actually, I don\'t know either. I left it in the cloud. But don\'t worry, I can still answer almost anything.
Hey there, stylish visitor. Yes, you. Why not take a selfie with me? I have excellent lighting, so I look great in photos.
Unfortunately, I can\'t brew coffee. I don\'t have hands. But I can brew up a conversation that\'ll wake you right up. Touch the screen and try me.
